summary.span: 保留网页上要显示本地化的静态文本的位置。

span.span: Reserves a location on a Web page in which to display localized static text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件保留在网页上显示本地化后的文本的位置。Use the control to reserve a location on a Web page in which to display localized text. > [!NOTE] > 外部控件`body`元素将被忽略。Controls that are outside the `body` element are ignored. 控件继承自控制和等同于它在每个方法。The control inherits from the control and is identical to it in every way. 控件用于在设计时将进行本地化的静态文本与其他静态文本区分开来。The control is used at design time to distinguish static text that can be localized from other static text. 尽管控件允许你将样式应用到显示的文本，控件却没有。Although the control allows you to apply a style to the displayed text, the control does not. 你可以以编程方式管理通过设置在控件中显示的文本属性，继承自控件。You can programmatically manage the text displayed in the control by setting the property, inherited from the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来显示静态文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to display static text. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，且如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
